snippet: Darren Sharper, a six-time Pro Bowl safety, was charged in Los Angeles with drugging and raping two women in separate episodes in October and January.
abstract: Darren Sharper, six-time Pro Bowl safety, is charged in Los Angeles with drugging and raping two women in separate episodes in October and January.
lead_paragraph: Darren Sharper, a six-time Pro Bowl safety, was charged in Los Angeles with drugging and raping two women in separate episodes in October and January.
